titleStmt.title: Alazono-Mastix: or The character of a Cockney: in a satyricall poem. : Dedicated (as a New-years-gift) to the Apprentices of London. By Junius Anonymus, a London Apprentice.
titleStmt.author: Junius Anonymus.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 1st 1651"; the "2" in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
